wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Pomfret (18 April 1941 – 1 May 2001) was a British middle-distance runner. He competed in the men's 3000 metres steeplechase at the 1964 Summer Olympics.He also represented England in the 3,000 metres steeplechase, at the 1966 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Kingston, Jamaica.
